author: Abhishyant Kidangoor
title: Modi’s Hasty Coronavirus Lockdown of India Leaves Many Fearful for What Comes Next
description: Jaya Kumari worked as a cook and cleaner for a couple in an affluent New Delhi neighborhood until two weeks ago. She lost her job when the family she worked for decided to leave the crowded capital and move to their hometown 200 miles away as the coronavirus …
